tfwmdsMsgSummaryProps.name: type
tfwmdsMsgSummaryProps.description: Type of the message component. As default it is info. Available types: info, success, success-fill, success-fill-no-icon, warning, error

tfwmdsMsgSummaryProps.name: title
tfwmdsMsgSummaryProps.description: The title text for the message displayed as h3.

tfwmdsMsgSummaryProps.name: subtitle
tfwmdsMsgSummaryProps.description: The subtitle text for the message.

tfwmdsMsgSummaryProps.name: contentText
tfwmdsMsgSummaryProps.description: Required. The text that displays in the message component. You can use any string with this option. If you set contentHTML, this option is not required and is ignored.

tfwmdsMsgSummaryProps.name: contentHTML
tfwmdsMsgSummaryProps.description: Required. The HTML to use within the message component. You can use any string with this option. If you set contentHTML, contentText is not required and is ignored.

tfwmdsMsgSummaryProps.name: dismissable
tfwmdsMsgSummaryProps.description: If dismissable is set to true, the component will display a close icon.

tfwmdsMsgSummaryProps.name: classes
tfwmdsMsgSummaryProps.description: Classes to add to the summary container.
